title: Public perception vs ecological quality status: Examining the ecological restoration of the Congost River's Environment
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Quim Zaldo-Aubanell, Antoni Mas-Ponce, Guiu Asbert, Berta Clota, Manel Isnard, Lorenzo Proia, Albert Bach, Sònia Sànchez Mateo
